entries.name: file_name
entries.desc: The file name of this input method, usually given during initialization.

entries.name: prompt
entries.desc: The irb prompt associated with this input method

entries.name: new(file = STDIN_FILE_NAME)
entries.desc: Creates a new input method object

entries.name: gets()
entries.desc: Reads the next line from this input method.

entries.name: readable_after_eof?()
entries.desc: Whether this input method is still readable when there is no more data to read.
